subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The unseeded Argentine José Acasuso advanced to his second Copa Telmex final with a 4-6, 6-4, 6-4 victory over eighth-seeded Filippo Volandri of Italy in Buenos Aires. He will face top-seeded David Nalbandian, who defeated fourth-seeded Juan Ignacio Chela, 6-1, 6-2, in an all-Argentine semifinal.
